channel.title: Exercises: Functions :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: To solve problems with code, you need to be able to break large problems into small ones. Usually, these smaller problems will take the form of functions that are used to solve the larger problem. Therefore, to solve problems with code, you need to be skilled at writing functions. And to master functions, you need to write a lot of them. These exercises ask you to write many relatively small functions, which combine to form larger, more complicated ones.
